price: ከዚያም መልክተኞቻችንን እነዚያንም ያመኑትን እናድናለን፡፡ እንደዚሁም ምእምናንን (ከጭንቅ ሁሉ) እናድናለን፡፡ (ይህ) በእኛ ላይ ተረጋገጠ፡፡
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نُنجِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī rusulanā wa-alladhīna āmanū kadhālika ḥaqqan ʿalaynā nunji al-mu'minīna
